title: VP of Software Engineering @ Trilogy
body:
Led backend engineering team, growing from ~6 to ~20 engineers while scaling from 3 to 8 concurrent products. Established hiring pipelines, internal processes, and engineering best practices enabling rapid team growth.

Spearheaded AI adoption strategy during 2024, achieving productivity gains while industry-wide metrics showed decreases. Built internal automation and productivity infrastructure (CI/CD pipelines, JIRA automations, dashboard/leaderboard systems) alongside transforming engineering processes. Shipped multiple greenfield products from development through production operations.
